Articles.Content:
I have encountered the glitch again from this older post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88642-Contracts-disappearing-and-Toolbar-glitch

Here is a screenshot showing the multiple copies of the buttons from the toolbar:

After force-exiting the game (space center button would not respond), all active contracts disappeared:

Here are the output logs - (1) from the glitch and (2) from after: http://www.4shared.com/get/QJnGFP2mce/Output_logs.html

The bug appeared after trying to switch to another vessel in orbit mode. After a frenzy of clicking on it, it switched to the probe around Gilly and the bug appeared. Space center button wouldn't work and switching to another ship would result in a weird camera angle, constantly zooming out.

I'm running KSP x64, Steam version with these mods:

-Better Atmospheres and all it's dependencies, except Custom Asteroids, Kittopia terraformig tools (crashes x64) and Sunflares

-Alarm Clock

-MechJeb

-Protractor

-Enhanced navball

-Object enhancement

-Docking Alignment Indicator

Hi,

Wow this is a new one I hope they find it; and this is why I use game saves in 'real missions' ... I have a ton of mods and have switched ships - for me it is usually just memory; you get to the end of the game memory useage; I have about 300+ megs gameplay which lasts about an hour. I also have to reload copies of my modded tree; just a minor inconvenience or 2 for an Alpha game (SIM!).

Cmdr Zeta
